title: Mysery Champ Day! (or skin otherwise)
body:
Misery or mystery? Why not both? Mysery champs!

The day has arrived! The mystery champs are arriving. Comment who you got and how you feel about it. I'll let you guys know who I got as soon as they arrive. Upvote so more people can share, I'm curious to see who everyone got! 

The hype is real.

Update: Hey everyone! I got Jarvin IV! Not bad! {{champion:59}} 

Update: Everyone check out my new thread-it's very personal to everyone- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Z4e0Rkp3-petition-to-get-3-refunds-at-level-30

replies.body: day 578: Still no champion
LOL logged in to upvote
Maybe the mystery champs joined Ao Shin xD
how I feel

I actually got this challenge that I'm telling people to do.

Challenge: Main the mystery champ or skin you get for the WHOLE PATCH.

I'm up for it, are you?
upvotes because bard is life
Challenge accepted. {{champion:114}}
http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100406142514/spongebob/images/e/e3/Oneeternitylater.jpg
July 1st 2015, 3:27  : No Champions yet :(
July 1st, 6:23 pm - No champions yet. Running low on mana and health. Might recall, but don't want to give up.

{{champion:131}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} 

Would love to get one of these bad boys.
(diana is a girl ;) )
I've been waiting so long that my mustache when from {{champion:119}}  to {{champion:79}}

http://cdn.meme.am/images/300x/9794307.jpg
Still Waiting
Everybody hop aboard the HYPEEEEEE TRAIN!!!!! CHOO CHOO
My hype died 5 hours ago {{champion:32}}
yea its 7 now where I'm at , the hype is gone

Summoner's Journal, Day 135:
The Summoner's Rift has been overgrown as the mystery champs still await being seen.  {{champion:57}}  and {{champion:143}}  seem to be at home with the vegetation overrunning everything.  
We keep sending {{champion:26}} and {{champion:245}} out on scouting missions to the future for any glimpses of hope.  So far, they have returned empty handed.  
Today, a fight broke out over the age of the deadline.  
{{champion:81}} wanted to have it placed in a museum, while {{champion:72}} wanted to take it on a date.  
We try to remain patient, but it's only a matter of time before {{champion:31}} eats all of the provisions.  
Even now, {{champion:96}} is surviving solely on a diet of leftover {{item:2052}}.

It's turning into chaos out here.  I don't know how long we can hold out.
May {{champion:17}} have mercy on our souls....
{{champion:115}} Impatient? I'm not impatient.

you missed the t in your title and i read it as "misery champ day"

all I could think about was how miserable it would truly be if people spammed {{champion:17}} all day
Update: I made it look intentional, ssh

LOL

Man if everyone decides to play teemo today I WILL find you =P
That would be a perfect featured game mode. 5 Teemos on each team.
oh my, i can hear it now "Hut two thr-.."
I think Tahm ate all of our champions...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IkdmOVejUlI
I think that every day we don't get the free champ they should add another one to the list. So tomorrow everyone gets 2 champs and if friday, then 2 champs and a skin free.
Well...I just got {{champion:238}}  - time to learn him I guess
Wow this is proof that Rito thinks EU>NA :/
i want a 6300 champ cause i havent got one, but i have been playing for ages ;-;

i have 7 6300 champs without using rp
i use rp for runes and skins so
lol
{{champion:266}} is the champ i want so bad
RP for runes? O.o
when exactly are we suppose to get them oo?
We will most likely get them around 9am PST when Riot offices really start rolling out of bed much like when new champs get released on patch days.

> [{quoted}](name=LordDarkshayde,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=kzABcpIr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-01T13:13:10.986+0000)
>
> We will most likely get them around 9am PST when Riot offices really start rolling out of bed much like when new champs get released on patch days.

Just to inform people, 9AM PST just happened, so hype!
Still nothing here I really hope I get it and don't wind up getting bugged out of getting it or something. {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

Some claim to have gotten them already, I'm guessing thy're going to ship them out over the course of the day like they did the mystery skins.

Patience is a virtue {{champion:98}}
Well, I've spent my entire Canada day sitting in front of my computer waiting for my mystery champ. Good thing everything else is closed and I had nothing else I could do

*me this morning* OH MY GOD TIME TO GET MY NEW CHAMP. aw its 4:00 and theres still no champ? guess ill just play a few games... 7:39 still no champ... {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
How about we get a free skin with the champ since it's taking so long? :D #6:09 EST still no champ
I hope I get Vlad.  I've been wanting to play him a lot recently.
never play vlad. he needs to not exist. Riot already said it was a mistake to release him and he is too stupid of a champ to ever be played.
{{champion:8}} "Please, Let it all out"

Still no champion, it's 1:34 PDT where I am.
Could somebody use {{summoner:2}} to figure out where they all went?
I'm going to get my nly 1350 ip champ, malphite. I fucking swear
i bought my last 1350 just to avoid that.
Personally I would be happy with anyone who's 4800 or above, I only have a few 3150s remaining

Well, I do not even have to look what I get, since there is only 1 champ i never bought.....
Teemo...
I believe in god you know...
